capability.name: Correspondent Bank Operations
capability.definition: This service domain fulfils correspondent banking arrangements between the bank and its correspondent banking partners. This includes handling the clearing and settlement of payments to/from the correspondent banks, typically using the SWIFT payment network.
capability.role: This Service Domain handles incoming and outgoing payment clearing and settlement messages to the bank's correspondent banking partners. The actual message transmission is delegated to the Financial Message Gateway service domain. Correspondent Bank administers the mirror accounting for interbank payments undertaking the underlying account reconciliation tasks.
capability.example: Transfer funds from a customer account with the bank to an account with another bank.

key_features.name: Handle correspondent payment transactions
key_features.description: Enables handle correspondent payment transactions to support this service domain fulfils correspondent banking arrangements between the bank and its correspondent banking partners

key_features.name: Maintain and reconcile shadow accounting
key_features.description: Enables maintain and reconcile shadow accounting to support this service domain fulfils correspondent banking arrangements between the bank and its correspondent banking partners

key_features.name: Generate and process SWIFT messages
key_features.description: Enables generate and process swift messages to support this service domain fulfils correspondent banking arrangements between the bank and its correspondent banking partners
